title: Sans Serif from Wendelien van Oldenborgh: A Well Respected Man, or Book of Echoes
content:
Hello,  
Can someone please help ID the Sans Serif used on this book cover and inside?  
Thanks in advance!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131105105935im_/http:/typophile.com/files/A-well-respected-man-e1354337976192-764x1024_4294.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131105105935im_/http:/typophile.com/files/photo_4355.JPG)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131105105935im_/http:/typophile.com/files/photo2_4954.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131105105935im_/http:/typophile.com/files/photo3_4882.jpg)
author: takashikato78

comments.content:
Sounds lazy but may be [Helvetica Neue](http://web.archive.org/web/20131105105935/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/helvetica+neue)...

EDIT: sorry for mistake, I was totally wrong, that's definitely Folio.

It is close to Helvetica Neue but slightly different.  
Can you see the lowercase a.  
Thanks.

Yes!  
Thats looks like it.  
Thank you Jan!
